text: He imanadaragana! Balapurbaka nariderake uttaradhikare grahana kara tomadera jan'ye halala naya ebam taderake ataka rekho na yate tomara taderake ya pradana karecha tara kiyadansa niye na'o; kintu tara yadi kona prakasya aslilata kare! Naridera sathe sadbhabe jibana-yapana kara. Atahpara yadi taderake apachanda kara, tabe hayata tomara emana eka jinisake apachanda karacha, yate allaha, aneka kalyana rekhechena.
